tool_description: CryptoCator Stock Indicators for cryptocurrencies is a API library package that produces financial market technical indicators. Moving averages, Relative Strength Index, Stochastic Oscillator, Parabolic SAR, and more.
name: CryptoCator
title: CryptoCator

api_list.description: Created by Richard Donchian, Donchian Channels, also called Price Channels, are price ranges derived from highest High and lowest Low values.

optional_parameters.name: lookbackPeriods
optional_parameters.description: Number of periods (N) in the moving average. Must be greater than 1.

optional_parameters.name: percentOffset
optional_parameters.description: Percent offset for envelope width. Example: 3.5% would be entered as 3.5 (not 0.035). Must be greater than 0. Typical values range from 2 to 10. Default is 2.5.

optional_parameters.name: movingAverageType
optional_parameters.description:
Type of moving average (e.g. SMA, EMA, HMA).

Supported Types:
ALMA	Arnaud Legoux Moving Average
DEMA	Double Exponential Moving Average
EPMA	Endpoint Moving Average
EMA	Exponential Moving Average
HMA	Hull Moving Average
SMA	Simple Moving Average (default)
SMMA	Smoothed Moving Average
TEMA	Triple Exponential Moving Average
WMA	Weighted Moving Average

api_list.name: Hurst Exponent
api_list.description: The Hurst Exponent (H) is part of a Rescaled Range Analysis, a random-walk path analysis that measures trending and mean-reverting tendencies of incremental return values. When H is greater than 0.5 it depicts trending. When H is less than 0.5 it is is more likely to revert to the mean. When H is around 0.5 it represents a random walk.
